text: I'm Justin Antoni pille and I'm the CEO
and founder of wire wheel wire wheel is
a privacy and data protection platform
we leverage a whole bunch of
infrastructure that's present on AWS to
help companies solve privacy and data
protection problems as companies collect
more and more data from people around
the world companies need to have a way
to show that they're doing the right
thing with personal information but if
you go to most companies right now and
you ask them that personal information I
gave you
where are you storing it who and what is
accessing it and what third parties have
you given access to they can't answer
that question and to be honest setting
aside all of the regulations that's just
not defensible
privacy and data protection showing that
you're doing the right thing with
personal information is one of those
things you have to pay attention to and
you got to pay attention to it fast and
if you haven't looked up general data
protection regulation you have to do it
because every single company wants to be
an actor on the world stage and if you
haven't thought about privacy by design
you're gonna have some problems later on
a lot of people think of this as a
European law but it applies to any
company that offers a service in Europe
so if you put an app in the EU app store
you're arguably directly covered by this
law and it provides for fines up to four
percent of your global revenue if you
can't show that you're doing the right
thing with the personal information you
really need to be able to show you know
what you're collecting you know where
you're storing it you know who and what
is accessing it and you know what third
parties you've brought into that chain
and that's what wire wheel does we help
you map that entire ecosystem where is
your data
where are your servers what are your
third-party services what are your AWS
services we do it fast in a way that you
can show your customers that they should
trust you
